verses.verse: <S%G1437>Though<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> with the <S%G1100>tongues<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> and of <S%G32>angels,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> not <S%G26>charity,<s%> I am <S%G1096>become<s%> as <S%G2278>sounding<s%> <S%G5475>brass,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G214>tinkling<s%> <S%G2950>cymbal.<s%>

And <S%G1437>though<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> the gift of <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> and <S%G1492>understand<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3466>mysteries,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge;<s%> and <S%G1437>though<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that I could <S%G3179>remove<s%> <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> not <S%G26>charity,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

And <S%G1437>though<s%> I <S%G5595>bestow<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> my <S%G5224>goods<s%> to <S%G5595>feed<s%> the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> and <S%G1437>though<s%> I <S%G3860>give<s%> my <S%G4983>body<s%> to be <S%G2545>burned,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> not <S%G26>charity,<s%> it <S%G5623>profits<s%> me <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

<S%G26>Charity<s%> <S%G3114>suffers<s%> <S%G3114>long,<s%> and is <S%G5541>kind;<s%> <S%G26>charity<s%> <S%G2206>envies<s%> not; <S%G26>charity<s%> <S%G4068>braggs<s%> not itself, is not <S%G5448>puffed<s%> up,
Does not <S%G807>behave<s%> itself unseemly, <S%G2212>seeks<s%> not her <S%G1438>own,<s%> is not easily <S%G3947>provoked,<s%> <S%G3049>thinks<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2556>evil;<s%>

<S%G26>Charity<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G1601>fails:<s%> but <S%G1535>whether<s%> there be <S%G4394>prophecies,<s%> they shall <S%G2673>fail;<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> there be <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> they shall <S%G3973>cease;<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> there be <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> it shall <S%G2673>vanish<s%> <S%G2673>away.<s%>
For we <S%G1097>know<s%> in <S%G3313>part,<s%> and we <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> in <S%G3313>part.<s%>
But <S%G3752>when<s%> that which is <S%G5046>perfect<s%> is <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> that which is in <S%G3313>part<s%> shall be <S%G2673>done<s%> <S%G2673>away.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> I was a <S%G3516>child,<s%> I <S%G2980>spoke<s%> as a <S%G3516>child,<s%> I <S%G5426>understood<s%> as a <S%G3516>child,<s%> I <S%G3049>thought<s%> as a <S%G3516>child:<s%> but <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1096>became<s%> a <S%G435>man,<s%> I <S%G2673>put<s%> <S%G2673>away<s%> <S%G3516>childish<s%> things.

For <S%G737>now<s%> we <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> a <S%G2072>glass,<s%> <S%G1722>darkly;<s%> <S%G135><s%> but <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> to <S%G4383>face:<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> I <S%G1097>know<s%> in <S%G3313>part;<s%> but <S%G5119>then<s%> shall I <S%G1921>know<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as <S%G2532>also<s%> I am <S%G1921>known.<s%>
